name: Pot Farm: Grass Roots
description:
Play the most addictive weed game on mobile!
Grow Your Own Weed and Start a 420 Friendly Farm!
Start by planting seeds, harvesting buds and growing your business! Upgrade contraptions, hire workers and sell goods to your buds! Fill deliveries, make stoner products and create dank edibles to keep customers happy. Decorate your farm, rent custom cars, unlock gizmos, and become the next marijuana mogul!
Features
•Time-limited Fall Theme!
•Spooky, Halloween themed Workers
•New Gizmos, decorations and more!
•Plant, water & trim plants on your custom farm
•Harvest potent strains of sativa & indica
•Sell weed & goods to other players
•Enter Karma contests during the week!
•Sell & trade kush with neighbors & friends
•Connect with Facebook to play with your buds
There’s so much to do - the growing never ends!
≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈≈
Follow @PFGrassRoots on Twitter.com/PFGrassRoots, Instagram.com/PFGrassRoots and on Facebook.com/PotFarmGrassRoots.
Terms of Service - http://eastsidegamestudio.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy - http://eastsidegamestudio.com/privacy-policy
Email Support - support@potfarmgrassroots.zendesk.com
Please note that Pot Farm: Grass Roots is free to download and play, but some game items are available for purchase using real money. A network connection is also required.
